name: Anti Shooter
description:
Anti Shooter is a shoot’em up game akin to the old classic arcade games, except we skipped out on the shooting part! Instead your ship will act as a magnet to enemy projectiles around you, and you have to use that magnetic force to sling the projectiles back at the enemy with the goal of surviving for as long as possible and racking up the highest score possible!

To start the game, simply run the Anti_Shooter3.exe (Win 64-bit) file and get playing. Instructions of how to play can be found in the game from the main menu. The game is made using Unreal Engine 4.

Tip: Play with an controller (Xbox-controller) for maximum immersive. Steer with the left thump-stick.

Made in collaboration with 
NordicGamer: https://nordicgamer.itch.io/
GameWolf3000: https://gamewolf3000.itch.io/
